cast.overview: Television tabloid reporter Kimberly Beckmen reveals shocking behind-the-scenes stories that could take down the world of professional wrestling.
cast.title: Turnbuckle

cast.original_title: Juste pour rire 2016 - Maxim Martin vs Dominic Paquet
cast.title: Juste pour rire 2016 - Maxim Martin vs Dominic Paquet

cast.overview: Doug Glatt, a slacker who discovers he has a talent for brawling, is approached by a minor league hockey coach and invited to join the team as the "muscle." Despite the fact that Glatt can't skate, his best friend, Pat, convinces him to give it a shot, and Glatt becomes a hero to the team and their fans, until the league's reigning goon becomes threatened by Glatt's success and decides to even the score.
cast.title: Goon

cast.original_title: Soul on Ice: Past, Present and Future
cast.overview: Soul On Ice: Past, Present, and Future is a film that presents and retells the unknown contributions of black athletes in ice hockey. For untold decades, hockey was seen as a homogeneous sport, exciting to watch but played by one kind of player. But people deserve to now know of the exploits of athletes who dared to stand out, and dared to make the sport their own. These Black athletes dared to give their sport soul.
cast.title: Soul on Ice: Past, Present and Future
